body:
A conversion is the goal that your retargeting campaign is attempting to achieve. It can be anything from a free trial download to a product purchase.

Our dashboard measures two different types of conversions: click-through conversions (CTC) and view-through conversions (VTC):

  • CTC is counted when a user clicks an ad and then converting as a direct result.

  • VTC counts customers who were shown an ad and did not click on it, but converted later.
name: Click-Through vs View-Through Conversions
title: Click-Through vs View-Through Conversions
